content.rendered:
The Saratoga Springs City School District is proud of the great achievements of the thousands upon thousands of Saratoga alumni. We’ve added a few helpful links you might find helpful.

Alumni / Reunion Pages

If you would like to announce reunions or important dates on this page, please send the information by email to m_manny@saratogaschools.org. 

  • Class of 1969: Visit the Class of 1969 Facebook page
  • Class of 2009: Join the Class of 2009 Facebook group
  • Class of 1977: Visit the Class of 1977 Facebook page
  • Class of 1990: Visit the Class of 1990 Facebook page
  • Class of 1995:  Visit the Class of 1955 Facebook page
  • Class of 2000: Visit the Class of 2000 Facebook group
  • Class of 2001: Join the Class of 2001 Facebook group
  • Class of 2005: Visit the Class of 2005 Facebook page
    • The Class of 2005 will hold a 20th reunion on October 11 at Harvey’s Restaurant and Bar in Saratoga Springs.  Ticket information can be found on our facebook page or by contacting  saratogaclass2005@gmail.com.
  • Class of 2010: Join the Class of 2010 Facebook group
  • Class of 2012: Join the Class of 2012 Facebook group

Transcript/Graduate Record Requests

Requests for transcripts can be made by filling out the Transcript / Graduate Record Request Form.

All alumni transcripts requests will be processed on a four (4) day work day completion and will be done in the order they are received. This policy is not in effect during school breaks/holidays. However, they will be processed as soon as possible upon return from break. If you have questions, please call (518) 587-6690 Ext. 33310.
